Cards.Name: Malagant Zal
Cards.Rules Text:
Scout - (Can attack Ready Stealth Units.)

Enduring - Can not be K.O.’d in combat with 4 or less cards in hand.

Cards.Name: Knight Jack
Cards.Rules Text:
Piercing - (Attacks ignore 1 energy shield.)
Phase - When attacking, Rest 1 energy to switch with a Phase Unit from the Energy Field.
[Phasing] - +1 dmg for one attack.

Cards.Name: Knight Rebeca
Cards.Rules Text:
Cleanse - [On Play] Target spell or ability is Discarded from the Battleground. 
Phase - When attacking, Rest 1 energy to switch with a Phase Unit from the Energy Field.
[Phasing] - +1 dmg for one attack.

Cards.Name: Knight Gawain
Cards.Rules Text:
Recon - [On Play] Draw 1 card.
Phase - When attacking, Rest 1 energy to switch with a Phase Unit from the Energy Field.
[Phasing] - +1 dmg for one attack.

Cards.Name: Knight Percival
Cards.Rules Text:
Taunt - (This Unit must be attacked if Rested.)
Phase - When attacking, Rest 1 energy to switch with a Phase Unit from the Energy Field.
[Phasing] - +1 dmg for one attack.

Cards.Name: Knight Robertson
Cards.Rules Text:
Phase - When attacking, Rest 1 energy to switch with a Phase Unit from the Energy Field.
[Phasing] - Discard 1 Focus: Return 1 enemy Unit with cost 2 or less to owner’s hand.

Cards.Name: Knight Elise
Cards.Rules Text:
Charged - [Once] Discard 1 Focus: This Unit gains +1 dmg for every card in your hand (Max 5 dmg).
Phase - When attacking, Rest 1 energy to switch with a Phase Unit from the Energy Field.
[Phasing] - +1 dmg for one attack.

Cards.Name: Knight Lt. Ezra
Cards.Rules Text:
Null Zone - [On Play] One enemy Unit with cost 4 or less is Null (Flipped over til your next turn.)
Phase - When attacking, Rest 1 energy to switch with a Phase Unit from the Energy Field.
[Phasing] - +1 dmg for one attack.

Cards.Name: Knight Major Brock
Cards.Rules Text:
Enforcer - [On Play] Place target Unit with cost 4 or less to the bottom of the owner's deck.
Phase - When attacking, Rest 1 energy to switch with a Phase Unit from the Energy Field.
[Phasing] - +1 dmg for one attack.

Cards.Name: Tyrfing
Cards.Rules Text:
Comes into play Rested.
Tyrfing Blade - Rest: Give a Unit or Cmdr +1 dmg.
Tyrfing’s Wrath - Rest & Remove: Draw 2 cards and Discard 1.

Cards.Name: Soulguard Armor
Cards.Rules Text:
Comes into play Rested.
Soulguard Armor - Rest: Prevent 1 dmg to any Unit or Cmdr.
Soulguard’s Wrath - Rest & Remove: Prevent dmg equal to your Cmdr Shield value.

Cards.Name: Purity Shrine
Cards.Rules Text:
Comes into play Rested.
Increase and heal Cmdr base health by +1 in all forms.
Rest Purity Shrine: Discard 1 5th Army Artifact Golem Core from the Energy Field: Heal 1 dmg to Cmdr and Draw 1 Card.

Cards.Name: Stormkal Grimoire
Cards.Rules Text:
[Upkeep]- Remove this card.
Place on the Battleground: No Cmdr can play spell or ability cards. 

Remove card from the game.

Cards.Name: Warp
Cards.Rules Text:
Summon one Unit from the Energy Field to the Battleground by paying it's summoning cost.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Equivalent Exchange
Cards.Rules Text: Discard “x" Focus: Target Cmdr Discards “x” Faction Resource cards.

Cards.Name: Meditation
Cards.Rules Text:
Discard 2 and Draw 2 cards.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Not on My Watch
Cards.Rules Text:
Return up to 1 Unit with cost of 3 or less to owner's hand.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Phase Shifting
Cards.Rules Text:
Return a Unit with Phase to your hand. Then summon another Unit with Phase to the Battleground from your hand. Pay the difference in cost with energy if it cost more.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Vanishing Seal
Cards.Rules Text:
Choose 1:
• K.O. enemy Unit with cost 5 or less.
• Discard 1 card from hand: K.O. enemy Unit with cost 6 or less.

Cards.Name: Gods Wrath
Cards.Rules Text:
Put all Units with a cost of 3 (Discard 1 Focus: 4) or less at the bottom of the owner's Deck. After, your opponent and you Discard all cards from your hands and Draw 5 cards.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Sting
Cards.Rules Text:
Target Unit or Cmdr gains +1 dmg this combat and Draw 1 card.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Thunder Shield
Cards.Rules Text:
Prevent 2 dmg.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Guess Again
Cards.Rules Text:
Give a Unit or Cmdr +1 dmg during this combat. After combat, return an enemy Unit with cost of 4 or less from the Battleground to the owner's hand.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Angel's Wrath
Cards.Rules Text:
Discard 1 Card from your hand: Target Unit or Cmdr gains +2 dmg this combat.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Divine Light
Cards.Rules Text:
Prevent 1 dmg and Draw 1 card.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Reconstruction
Cards.Rules Text:
Discard 1 energy card: Ready 2 Artifact Golem cards from Energy Field.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Snap
Cards.Rules Text:
Summon up to one 5th Army Unit with a cost of 3 or less from your hand to the Battleground.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Athena's Core

[On Play To Energy] - Swap a face down card with this core.
Rest this core to get 1 energy.
Athena’s Core - Rest & Remove: [Defender] Prevent all dmg dealt to Athena for one attack.

Cards.Name: 5th Army's Core
Cards.Rules Text:
[On Play To Energy] - Swap a face down card with this core.
Rest this core to get 1 energy.

Cards.Rules Text: Distraction - [On Play] Discard 1 Rage: Rest target Unit cost 2 or less.

Cards.Name: Balfour

Defender - (Rest Unit to intercept incoming attack.)
Piercing - (Attacks ignore 1 energy shield.)

Cards.Name: Wolfgrim

Cards.Rules Text:
Haste (Can attack when summoned.)
Execute - [On Play] Discard 1 Rage: K.O. enemy Unit with cost 2 or less.

Initiative (Can attack Ready Units.)
Shadows - When attacking, Discard 1 Rage: Summon a Crimson Shadow Unit cost 2 or less from the Discard, it gains Haste (Can attack when summoned.) and is K.O. ‘d at end of turn.

Comes into play Rested.

You may Rest one enemy Unit cost 4 or less. The next Crimson Shadow Unit you summon gains 
Haste (Can attack when summoned.)

Cards.Rules Text:
Target Unit gains Break (Ignores Taunt and Defender from Units with lower cost.) for next attack.

Cards.Name: Blood Rush
Cards.Rules Text:
The next Crimson Shadow Unit summoned gains Haste (Can attack when summoned.)

Generate 1 Rage.

Cards.Name: Cower

[Upkeep] - Discard this card.

Choose 1:
• K.O. enemy Unit cost 5 or less.

Cards.Rules Text:
Discard 1 card: Target Unit or Cmdr gains +2 dmg this attack.

Cards.Rules Text: When a ally Crimson Shadow Unit is K.O.'d, Draw 1 card.

Cards.Name: Sacrifice

Cards.Name: Roll The Dice

Discard your hand and Draw that many.

Generate 1 Rage.

Health = Bleed under Blood Dragon.

Toxin (When attacking, Discard 1 Bleed: Add +1 dmg to this attack.)

"Satin's Backstab cost 1 less."

• Target receives -2 dmg for one attack. Discard 1 Bleed: For -1 dmg.

K.O. target Unit with cost of 1 or less.
2 or less Discard 1 Bleed.
3 or less Discard 2 Bleed.
4 or less Discard 3 Bleed.

Choose 1:
• Generate 3 Bleed.
• Ready 2 energy.

Generate 1 Bleed.

Battler - [Once][Main] Discard 1 card and Draw 1 card.

"If card Discarded is a Silvermoon Clan Unit, you may Discard 1 instead.

Flames (Discard 1 Rage: Add +1 dmg to Ragnar.)

Frenzy - Discard "x" Rage: Add "x" dmg for this attack.

[On Play To Energy] - Swap a face down card with this core.

Cards.Rules Text:

Target Unit or Cmdr gains Riposte (Deals dmg in combat while being attacked.)

• Unit or Cmdr gains +3 dmg this attack.

Generate 1 Rage.

Discard 1 Rage: Gain Initiative (Can attack Ready Units.)

Discard the top 5 cards of your Deck and put them in any order. Discard 1 Rage: Keep 1 Artifact Core from the cards Discarded. After everything else resolves put this card at the bottom of the Deck.

Generate 1 Rage.

Cards.Name: Flaming Fur

Generate 1 Rage.

Cards.Name: Incinerate

• K.O. one enemy Unit with cost of 4 or less.

Silvermoon Clan Units summoned this turn gain Haste (Can attack when summoned.)

Shuffle your Deck, then Discard 1 card from the top. After everything else resolves put this card at the bottom of the deck.

Generate 1 Rage.

Add +1 dmg to one attack and Draw 1 card.

Generate 1 Rage.

Reduce the cost by 1 for every Ready Unit Discarded. 
Discard up to 3 Units from your Battleground. For each Unit Discarded gain +2 dmg for this attack.

Generate 1 Rage.

Cards.Name: Fire Breathing
Cards.Rules Text:
Prevent 2 dmg to target Unit or Cmdr. Draw 1 and Discard 1 card.
"If card Discarded is a Silvermoon Clan Unit, Ready 1 energy.

Generate 1 Rage.

Cards.Rules Text: Discard "x" Rage: Draw "x" and Discard "x".

Cards.Name: Coup de Grace
Cards.Rules Text: Sacrafice "x" Ready Artifact Cores: Cmdr gains "x" dmg this attack.

Cards.Name: Ragnar's Core

[On Play To Energy] - Swap a face down card with this core.
Rest this core to get 1 energy.

Cards.Name: Silvermoon Core
Cards.Rules Text:
[On Play To Energy] - Swap a face down card with this core.
Rest this core to get 1 energy.

[Main] - Rest: Phoenix Keep: Discard all Focus from Keep, summon a 12th Army Unit from hand of equal or less cost to the amount of Focus Discarded.

Cards.Rules Text:
Draw 1 card and summon target 12th Army Unit cost 3 or less from Discard to the Battleground.

Vulcania gains +1 attack.

[Upkeep] - Remove this card.

Target Unit or Cmdr gains +1 dmg this combat. Discard 1 Focus: Draw 1 card.

Generate 1 Focus.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Pacifying Light

• Target Unit with cost of 4 less with Haste can not attack when summoned.

Generate 1 Focus.

Prevent 2 dmg to target Unit or Cmdr. Draw 1 and Discard 1 card. If card Discarded was a 12th Army Unit, heal Cmdr 1.

Generate 1 Focus.

Cards.Name: Combustion

Target Unit or Cmdr gains +3 dmg this combat and enemy Cmdr Discards 1 Resource card.

Generate 1 Focus

Play before [Defender] Phase.
Discard 2 Focus: Negate one enemy Unit (Discad 3 Focus: Cmdr) attack.

Cards.Name: Firefly

Cards.Name: Vulcania's Core

[On Play To Energy] - Swap a face down card with this core.
Rest this core to get 1 energy.

Cards.Name: 12th Army's Core

[On Play To Energy] - Swap a face down card with this core.
Rest this core to get 1 energy.

Cards.Name: Pogi J. Panda
Cards.Rules Text:
Loan - [On Play] Opponent Draws 1 card.
Appraisal - Rest: Look at opponents top card in Deck, leave it at the top or place it at bottom of Deck.

Shadow - Pogi J. Panda can not be attacked by Units.

Cards.Name: Damien Blackheart
Cards.Rules Text:
[Upkeep] - Transfer 1 Resource to keep this card in play. (Max 6)
Interrogation - Rest: Target Unit with cost equal to or less than amount of Resources under this card is Rested.
Torment - [On K.O.] Target player Discards 1 random card.

Cards.Name: Kaiser Rex
Cards.Rules Text:
[Upkeep] - Discard 1 Unit from the Battleground to keep this card in play.
Stealth (This Unit ignores Defender and Taunt.)
Rake - When attacking, if you K.O. an opponents Unit, you may Discard 3 cards to Ready this card.

Cards.Name: Vinx "Cat Burglar
Cards.Rules Text:
[Upkeep] - Discard the top card of your Deck and put it under Vinx.
Flux - Discard 2 cards under Vinx: Lower the cost of the next spell or ability by 1 til end of turn.
Thief - You may cast spells and abilities that are under Vinx.

Cards.Name: Aurelia Sunflower
Cards.Rules Text:
Cleanse - [On Play] Target spell or ability is Discarded from the Battleground.
Quick Heal - Rest: Heal Cmdr 2.
Does not count as a Mercenary.
Can be used by any Faction.

Cards.Name: Walker "Doc" Holiday
Cards.Rules Text:
Reaper - [On Play] Discard 1 Resource: K.O. enemy Unit with cost of 4 or less.

Cards.Name: Linsy Holiday

[Upkeep] - Rest 1 energy to keep this card in play.
Family - [On Play] Search Deck for "Holiday" card and reveal. Shuffle Deck and put card on top.

Cards.Name: Anton "Grim" Holiday

Scout (Can attack Ready Stealth Units.)

Scalp - [On K.O.] Enemy Discards 1 Resource.

Counts as a regular Unit if you have 2 "Holiday" in Deck.

Cards.Name: Joda Rot

Rampage - [Once] If this card K.O.'s a Unit with Defender or Taunt, Ready this card.

Cards.Name: Zephyr

Draw ❶ card.

require        energy to activate Phasing.

Comes into play Rested.
               Units gain +1 dmg.
When a Unit activates                     , Rest Phase Temple:

generate 1         Focus.”

Rest all enemy Units.
All enemy Units don’t ready next turn.

Give Athena +1 dmg and +2 armor until your next turn.
5th Army Units gain +1 dmg this turn.
Put one Unit with a casting cost of ❸ or less from your energy field face up onto the Battleground.

Cards.Rules Text:
Golem Core
                                         You can substitute a face down card
in the Energy Field Area for this Core.
